ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] dueling a druid
ygData.msgSnippet: We did some more experimentation last night.  With Guardian and elemental rythms I can get my MR to 171 and CR/FR to 86.  Drones of Doom ALWAYS lands.  We
ygData.messageBody:
We did some more experimentation last night. With Guardian and elemental rythms I can get my MR to 171 and CR/FR to 86. Drones of Doom ALWAYS lands. We tried it against purifying rythms, psalm of purity and vitality and Drones landed every time. I wouldn't mind so much but anti magic aria doesn't always take it off the first time -- or even the second. Elemental dots are a breeze for me to dispell but not this one.

Daniel Sniderman <fuzzbone@...> wrote:
Thanks for the info - my new guild (been in about four weeks) does a goodly
amount of dueling (although not much lately) - and I never had before. I
did pretty lousy the two times I tried so far.

BTW - why do you /stopsong twice?

Thanks

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 10, 2001 2:43 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] dueling a druid



I recommend setting up a social key:

/stopsong
/stopsong
/target <yourname>
/cast <song number>
/target <opponent´┐¢s name>
The nice thing about this social is your opponent is very quickly retargeted
so you can immediately resume punching/dismembering them.
